module.name: ap210_interconnect_requirement_allocation
module.name.french: Attribution de exigence d'interconnexion pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module, interconnect substrate, functional, physical, requirement allocation, requirement

abstract.p: the representation of interconnect requirement allocation. Interconnect requirement allocation includes the following information: complete functional and physical requirements, complete capability to allocate enterprise or external agency requirements to interconnect function or physical design, model based requirement description using simulation models and models with assigned parametric data. Capability to explicitly describe the required external connections for a printed wiring board or simple substrate. Capability to segregate the required external connections from the required functions other than simple interconnect for printed circuit boards (including printed components). Supporting data including document, authorization, product identification, external definition, and authorization are included.
abstract.li: requirement traceability between functional and physical requirements;
inclusion of both functional and physical requirements in same requirement collection;
inclusion of both functional and physical requirement allocation in design characteristic planning and evaluation.
